en-US.summary: Buddy helps people with dementia remember daily routines, family members, and medications through calm, patient voice conversations.
examplePhrases: What do I do this morning?
What do I take after breakfast?
en-US.name: Buddy - Dementia Care Assistant
en-US.description: Buddy is a voice-first AI assistant designed specifically for people living with dementia and Alzheimer's disease. It provides 24/7 memory support, routine guidance, and intelligent safety escalation through natural voice conversations. Built with Amazon Nova for the AI Hackathon 2026.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test with the provided demo patient 'John Doe'. Sample utterances: 'What do I do this morning?', 'Who is Sarah?', 'What do I take after breakfast?'. Test emergency escalation by saying 'I fell' or 'I need help'.
